Our Doctors
Here you can check all our doctors and their specialities
# Doctor Email Speciality
1 Steven Strange steven.strange@marvel.com Surgeon
2 John Doe john.doe@google.com Physician
{{i+1}} {{doctor.name}} {{doctor.email}} {{doctor.speciality}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-doctors-page', templateUrl: './doctors-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./doctors-page.component.scss'] }) export class DoctorsPageComponent { doctors = [ { name:'Peter Parker', email:'p.parker@gmail.com', speciality:'Spiderman' }, { name:'', email:'', speciality:'' }, ]; }
